description: Retrieve the information of a large person group, including its name, userData and recognitionModel. This API returns large person group information only, use [LargePersonGroup Person - List](/docs/services/563879b61984550e40cbbe8d/operations/599adda06ac60f11b48b5aa1) instead to retrieve person information under the large person group.

large_person_group_id.description: Id referencing a particular large person group.

return_recognition_model.description: A value indicating whether the operation should return 'recognitionModel' in response.
